006
007package renderer.scene;
008
009import java.util.List;
010import java.util.ArrayList;
011
012/**
013   A {@code Position} data structure represents a group of geometric objects
014   positioned (both location and orientation) in three-dimensional space as
015   part of a {@link Scene}. A {@code Position} is a recursive data structure.
016   Every {@code Position} object contains a {@link List} of nested
017   {@code Position} objects. The list of nested {@code Position}s lets us
018   define what are called hierarchical, or nested, scenes. These are scenes
019   that are made up of groups of models and each group can be moved around
020   in the scene as a single unit while the individual models in the group
021   can also be moved around within the group.
022<p>
023   A {@code Position} object holds references to a {@link Model} object,
024   a {@link Matrix} object, and a {@code List} of {@code Position} objects.
025   A {@code Position}'s {@code List} of {@code Position} objects creates
026   a tree data structure of {@code Position} objects. A {@code Position}'s
027   {@link Model} object represents a geometric shape in the {@link Scene}.
028   The role of a {@code Position}'s  {@link Matrix} can be understood two
029   ways. First, the {@link Matrix} determines the {@link Model}'s location
030   and orientation within the local coordinate system determined by the
031   {@code Position}'s parent {@code Position} (in the {@link Scene}'s forest
032   of {@code Position} objects). Second, the {@link Matrix} determines a new
033   local coordinate system within which the {@link Model} (and all the nested
034   models lower in the tree) is plotted. The two ways of understanding a
035   {@code Position}'s  {@link Matrix} correspond to reading a matrix
036   transformation expression
037   <pre>{@code
038                T * v
039   }</pre>
040   from either right-to-left or left-to-right.
041<p>
042   When the renderer renders a {@code Position} object, the renderer
043   traverses the tree of {@code Position}s rooted at the given
044   {@code Position}. The renderer does a recursive, pre-order
045   depth-first-traversal of the tree. As the renderer traverses the tree,
046   it accumulates a "current-transformation-matrix" that multiplies each
047   {@code Position}'s {@link Matrix} along the path from the tree's root
048   {@code Position} to wherever the traversal is in the tree (this is the
049   "pre-order" step in the traversal). The {@code ctm} is the current
050   model-to-view transformation {@link Matrix}. The first stage of the
051   rendering pipeline, {@link renderer.pipeline.Model2World}, multiplies every
052   {@link Vertex} in a {@link Model}'s vertex list by this {@code ctm}, which
053   converts the coordinates in each {@link Vertex} from the model's own local
054   coordinate system to the {@code Camera}'s view coordinate system (which is "shared"
055   by all the other models). Multiplication by the {@code ctm} has the effect
056   of "placing" the model in view space at an appropriate location (using the
057   translation part of the {@code ctm}) and in the appropriate orientation
058   (using the rotation part of the {@code ctm}). Notice the difference between
059   a {@code Position}'s {@code ctm} and the {@code Position}'s {@link Matrix}.
060   At any specific node in the {@link Scene}'s forest of {@code Position} nodes,
061   the {@code Position}'s {@link Matrix} places the {@code Position}'s
062   {@link Model} within the local coordinate system of the {@code Position}'s
063   parent {@code Position}. But the {@code Position}'s {@code ctm} places the
064   {@code Position}'s {@link Model} within the {@link Camera}'s view coordinate
065   system.
066*/
067public final class Position
068{
069   private Model model;
070   private Matrix matrix;
071   public final String name;
072   public final List<Position> nestedPositions;
073   public boolean visible;
074   public boolean debug;
075
076   /**
077      Construct a {@code Position} with the identity {@link Matrix},
078      the given {@link Model} object, and no nested {@code Position}s.
079
080      @param model  {@link Model} object to place at this {@code Position}
081      @throws NullPointerException if {@code model} is {@code null}
082   */
083   public Position(final Model model)
084   {
085      this(model,
086           model.name,        // default Position name
087           Matrix.identity(), // default matrix
088           new ArrayList<>(), // nestedPositions
089           true,              // visible
090           false);            // debug
091   }
092
093
094   /**
095      Construct a {@code Position} with the identity {@link Matrix},
096      the given {@link String} name, the given {@link Model} object,
097      and no nested {@code Position}s.
098
099      @param model  {@link Model} object to place at this {@code Position}
100      @param name   {@link String} name for this {@code Position}
101      @throws NullPointerException if {@code model} is {@code null}
102      @throws NullPointerException if {@code name} is {@code null}
103   */
104   public Position(final Model model, final String name)
105   {
106      this(model,
107           name,
108           Matrix.identity(), // default matrix
109           new ArrayList<>(), // nestedPositions
110           true,              // visible
111           false);            // debug
112   }
113
114
115   /**
116      Construct a {@code Position} with the given transformation {@link Matrix},
117      the given {@link String} name, the given {@link Model} object, and no
118      nested {@code Position}s.
119
120      @param model   {@link Model} object to place at this {@code Position}
121      @param name    {@link String} name for this {@code Position}
122      @param matrix  transformation {@link Matrix} for this {@code Position}
123      @throws NullPointerException if {@code model} is {@code null}
124      @throws NullPointerException if {@code name} is {@code null}
125      @throws NullPointerException if {@code matrix} is {@code null}
126   */
127   public Position(final Model model,
128                   final String name,
129                   final Matrix matrix)
130   {
131      this(model,
132           name,
133           matrix,
134           new ArrayList<>(), // nestedPositions
135           true,              // visible
136           false);            // debug
137   }
138
139
140   /**
141      Construct a {@code Position} with the given transformation {@link Matrix},
142      the given {@link Model} object, and no nested {@code Position}s.
143
144      @param model   {@link Model} object to place at this {@code Position}
145      @param matrix  transformation {@link Matrix} for this {@code Position}
146      @throws NullPointerException if {@code model} is {@code null}
147      @throws NullPointerException if {@code matrix} is {@code null}
148   */
149   public Position(final Model model,
150                   final Matrix matrix)
151   {
152      this(model,
153           model.name,        // default Position name
154           matrix,
155           new ArrayList<>(), // nestedPositions
156           true,              // visible
157           false);            // debug
158   }
159
160
161   /**
162      Construct a {@code Position} with the given translation {@link Vector},
163      the given {@link String} name, and the given {@link Model} object.
164
165      @deprecated  This constructor is here for compatibility with renderers 1 through 8.
166
167      @param model        {@link Model} object to place at this {@code Position}
168      @param name         {@link String} name for this {@code Position}
169      @param translation  translation {@link Vector} for this {@code Position}
170      @throws NullPointerException if {@code model} is {@code null}
171      @throws NullPointerException if {@code name} is {@code null}
172      @throws NullPointerException if {@code translation} is {@code null}
173   */
174   @Deprecated
175   public Position(final Model model,
176                   final String name,
177                   final Vector translation)
178   {
179      this(model,
180           name,
181           Matrix.translate(translation.x, translation.y, translation.z),
182           new ArrayList<>(), // nestedPositions
183           true,   // visible
184           false); // debug
185   }
186
187
188   /**
189      Construct a {@code Position} with the given translation {@link Vector}
190      and the given {@link Model} object.
191
192      @deprecated  This constructor is here for compatibility with renderers 1 through 8.
193
194      @param model        {@link Model} object to place at this {@code Position}
195      @param translation  translation {@link Vector} for this {@code Position}
196      @throws NullPointerException if {@code model} is {@code null}
197      @throws NullPointerException if {@code translation} is {@code null}
198   */
199   @Deprecated
200   public Position(final Model model,
201                   final Vector translation)
202   {
203      this(model,
204           model.name,  // default Position name
205           Matrix.translate(translation.x, translation.y, translation.z),
206           new ArrayList<>(), // nestedPositions
207           true,        // visible
208           false);      // debug
209   }
210
211
212   /**
213      Construct a {@code Position} object with all the given data.
214
215      @deprecated  This constructor is here for compatibility with renderers 1 through 8.
216
217      @param model        {@link Model} object to place at this {@code Position}
218      @param name         {@link String} name for this {@code Position}
219      @param translation  translation {@link Vector} for this {@code Position}
220      @param visible      boolean that determines this {@code Position}'s visibility
221      @param debug        boolean that determines if this {@code Position} is logged
222      @throws NullPointerException if {@code model} is {@code null}
223      @throws NullPointerException if {@code translation} is {@code null}
224      @throws NullPointerException if {@code name} is {@code null}
225   */
226   @Deprecated
227   public Position(final Model model,
228                   final String name,
229                   final Vector translation,
230                   final boolean visible,
231                   final boolean debug)
232   {
233      this(model,
234           model.name,  // default Position name
235           Matrix.translate(translation.x, translation.y, translation.z),
236           new ArrayList<>(), // nestedPositions
237           visible,
238           debug);
239   }
240
241
242   /**
243      Construct a {@code Position} object with all the given data.
244
245      @param model            {@link Model} object to place at this {@code Position}
246      @param name             {@link String} name for this {@code Position}
247      @param matrix           transformation {@link Matrix} for this {@code Position}
248      @param nestedPositions  a {link List} of nested {@link Position}s
249      @param visible          boolean that determines this {@code Position}'s visibility
250      @param debug            boolean that determines if this {@code Position} is logged
251      @throws NullPointerException if {@code model} is {@code null}
252      @throws NullPointerException if {@code name} is {@code null}
253      @throws NullPointerException if {@code matrix} is {@code null}
254      @throws NullPointerException if {@code nestedPositions} is {@code null}
255   */
256   public Position(final Model model,
257                   final String name,
258                   final Matrix matrix,
259                   final List<Position> nestedPositions,
260                   final boolean visible,
261                   final boolean debug)
262   {
263      if (null == model)
264         throw new NullPointerException("model must not be null");
265      if (null == name)
266         throw new NullPointerException("name must not be null");
267      if (null == matrix)
268         throw new NullPointerException("matrix must not be null");
269      if (null == nestedPositions)
270         throw new NullPointerException("nestedPositions must not be null");
271
272      this.model = model;
273      this.matrix = matrix;
274      this.name = name;
275      this.nestedPositions = nestedPositions;
276      this.visible = visible;
277      this.debug = debug;
278   }
279
280
281   /**
282      Add a nested {@code Position} (or Positions) to this {@code Position}'s
283      {@link List} of nested {@code Position}s.
284
285      @param pArray  array of nested {@code Position}s to add to this {@code Position}
286      @throws NullPointerException if any {@link Position} is {@code null}
287   */
288   public void addNestedPosition(final Position... pArray)
289   {
290      for (final Position p : pArray)
291      {
292         if (null == p)
293            throw new NullPointerException("Position must not be null");
294
295         nestedPositions.add(p);
296      }
297   }
298
299
300   /**
301      Get a reference to the nested {@code Position} at the given index in
302      this {@code Position}'s {@link List} of nested {@code Position}s.
303
304      @param index  index of the nested {@code Position} to return
305      @return nested {@code Position} at the specified index in the {@link List} of nested {@code Position}s
306      @throws IndexOutOfBoundsException if the index is out of range
307   */
308   public Position getNestedPosition(final int index)
309   {
310      return nestedPositions.get(index);
311   }
312
313
314   /**
315      Set a reference to the given {@link Position} object at the given index in this {@code Position}'s
316      {@link List} of nested {@link Position}s.
317
318      @param index     index of the nested {@link Position} to set
319      @param position  {@link Position} object to place at the specified index in the {@link List} of nested {@link Position}s
320      @throws NullPointerException if {@code position} is {@code null}
321      @throws IndexOutOfBoundsException if the index is out of range
322   */
323   public void setNestedPosition(final int index, final Position position)
324   {
325      if (null == position)
326         throw new NullPointerException("position must not be null");
327
328      nestedPositions.set(index, position);
329   }
330
331
332   /**
333      Get a reference to this {@code Position}'s {@link Model} object.
334
335      @return a reference to this {@code Position}'s {@link Model} object
336   */
337   public Model getModel()
338   {
339      return this.model;
340   }
341
342
343   /**
344      Set this {@code Position}'s {@link Model} object.
345
346      @param model  {@link Model} object to place at this {@code Position}
347      @return a reference to this {@link Position} object to facilitate chaining method calls
348      @throws NullPointerException if {@code model} is {@code null}
349   */
350   public Position setModel(final Model model)
351   {
352      if (null == model)
353         throw new NullPointerException("model must not be null");
354
355      this.model = model;
356      return this;
357   }
358
359
360   /**
361      Get a reference to this {@code Position}'s {@link Matrix} object.
362
363      @return a reference to this {@code Position}'s {@link Matrix} object
364   */
365   public Matrix getMatrix()
366   {
367      return this.matrix;
368   }
369
370
371   /**
372      Set this {@code Position}'s transformation {@link Matrix}.
373
374      @param matrix  {@link Matrix} object to use in this {@code Position}
375      @return a reference to this {@link Position} object to facilitate chaining method calls
376      @throws NullPointerException if {@code matrix} is {@code null}
377   */
378   public Position transform(final Matrix matrix)
379   {
380      if (null == matrix)
381         throw new NullPointerException("matrix must not be null");
382
383      this.matrix = matrix;
384      return this;
385   }
386
387
388   /**
389      Set this {@code Position}'s translation vector within
390      this {@code Position}'s {@link Matrix} object.
391
392      @deprecated  Use the {@link Matrix} API instead of this method.
393      This method is here for compatibility with renderers 1 through 8.
394
395      @param x  translation amount in the x-direction
396      @param y  translation amount in the y-direction
397      @param z  translation amount in the z-direction
398      @return a reference to this {@link Position} object to facilitate chaining method calls
399   */
400   @Deprecated
401   public Position translate(final double x,
402                             final double y,
403                             final double z)
404   {
405      this.matrix = Matrix.translate(x, y, z);
406      return this;
407   }
408
409
410   /**
411      For debugging.
412
413      @return {@link String} representation of this {@code Position} object
414   */
415   @Override
416   public String toString()
417   {
418      String result = "";
419      result += "Position: " + name + "\n";
420      result += "This Position's visibility is: " + visible + "\n";
421      result += "This Position's Matrix is\n";
422      result += matrix + "\n";
423      result += "This Position's Model is\n";
424      result += (null == model) ? "null\n" : model;
425      result += "This Position has " + nestedPositions.size() + " nested Positions\n";
426      for (Position p : this.nestedPositions)
427      {
428         result += p.toString();
429      }
430      return result;
431   }
432}
